name: Videobl
description:
Videobl is a free tool that enables anyone to request others to record themselves responding to questions, providing feedback, participating in surveys, etc. Simple to use - create a request, share it with others, sit back and collect responses!

Videobl API is really simple to use and given its REST nature is compatible with all programming languages.
